home.title: Draw Around
home.rules: In this game, you and your friends will sketch words or expressions and try to guess what each other's sketch meant. Each first word or sentence, picked by a player, will go around the circle, transformed all along as it's sketched then guessed again. At the end, we read the drawing pads to find out who's the best drawer!
